Ingredients.2: 2 large Roma tomatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds

Ingredients.3: 1 large cucumber, peeled and sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds

Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mozzarella cheese

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Bring balsamic vinegar to a boil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Boil until reduced to 1/4 cup, about 8 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature.

Directions.2: Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, mozzarella slices, and basil leaves in an alternating pattern on a small serving platter until platter is covered. Drizzle olive oil over the salad. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle 1 to 2 tablespoons of the cooled balsamic vinegar on top. Serve immediately.
